name: Apphoneus.
overview:
Apphoneus delivers innovative solutions for all App development applications and have been doing so since 2010. Our headquarters are in California, U.S. and have offices in London.

Our expert team keeps updated with changing innovations in the mobile computing industry and as the time came, responded to the changes and challenges through capacity-building in skills, technology and resources

We started focusing on iPhone app development, gained valuable experience and have now expanded to all major platforms including Apple iPhone, IPad, RIM’s BlackBerry, Google’s Android, Microsoft’s Windows Mobile and Symbian.
